meanings.sent1: The dunderhead forgot his keys at home.
meanings.sent2: Don't be a dunderhead and double-check your work.
meanings.sent3: The dunderhead tried to use a fork to eat soup.
meanings.sent4: His brain felt like a dunderhead, full of cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: She always remembered him as the dunderhead who wore mismatched socks.

meanings.sent1: The dunderhead couldn't solve the simple puzzle.
meanings.sent2: He's such a dunderhead, always getting lost in his own neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The dunderhead thought the moon was made of cheese.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him a dunderhead in the eyes of his friends.
meanings.sent5: The dunderhead's head was as hard as a rock, refusing to listen to reason.
